```{r, notebook-options, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  warning = FALSE,
  strip.white = TRUE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE
)

make_pretty_df <- function(df) {
  if (isTRUE(getOption("knitr.in.progress"))) {
    knitr::kable(df, "simple", format.args = list(big.mark = ",", scientific = FALSE))
  } else {
    df
  }
}
```
